sentences.english: In this paper, the preparation technology for Spirulina colour- pearled drink was studied.
sentences.chinese: 对螺旋藻珍珠粒饮料的制作技术进行了较深入地研究。

sentences.english: The caustic waters breed a blue-green algae called Spirulina.
sentences.chinese: 碱性水孕育了一种叫做螺旋藻的蓝绿藻。

sentences.english: The product is green. It has soft fermented milk and spirulina taste.
sentences.chinese: 产品呈嫩绿色，具有柔和的酸奶和螺旋藻混合的香气。

sentences.english: Spirulina also offers all vegetable, easy-to-digest, protein.
sentences.chinese: 螺旋藻同样也含有容易吸收的植物类蛋白。

sentences.english: The Spirulina possesses only LDH1 composed of H subunit.
sentences.chinese: 螺旋藻仅有由H亚基构成的纯合子LDH1。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the efficiency of spiring capsule to treat patients with vitiligo vulgaris.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察螺旋藻胶囊治疗寻常型白癜风的临床疗效。

sentences.english: Availability 0f recovering and reusing culture liquid of Spirulina plantensis is studied in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 探讨了对钝顶螺旋藻培养液进行回收再利用的可行性。

sentences.english: Serious close when, is taking helix alga still cellulose very good?
sentences.chinese: 严重便密时，服用螺旋藻好还是纤维素好？

sentences.english: The above results suggested that PSP posses certain hypoglycemic effect and deserve to further studying.
sentences.chinese: 观察螺旋藻多糖对青春双歧杆菌及乳杆菌的促进作用。

sentences.english: Can be helix alga treated gastritis and go spot?
sentences.chinese: 螺旋藻能治疗胃炎和去斑吗？

sentences.english: This article is to establish a method for measuring spirulina protein by glutamate dehydrogenase.
sentences.chinese: 建立一种用谷氨酸脱氢酶测定螺旋藻蛋白质的方法。

sentences.english: We study the Spirulina product to estimate its health benefits of the contra-fatigue function in mice.
sentences.chinese: 本研究对螺旋藻产品的抗疲劳功能进行了检验和评价。

sentences.english: Spirulina platensis was the most source of phycocyanin.
sentences.chinese: 钝顶螺旋藻是藻蓝蛋白提取纯化的主要来源。
